title: Vampire Syndrome
description: Jack Wendell, a vampire with Down Syndrome, fights to stay one step ahead of vampire security agents ordered to terminate him. Lilith, president of the vampires, wishes to protect Jack. Her husband Damien, chief of vampire security, wants to kill Jack. The world's vampires must choose sides as husband and wife play a deadly game of chess, with Jack as their innocent pawn.
author: Daven Anderson
